message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint and need to make a smart financial decision.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $12,000 is a significant drop from my initial offer.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?  This product is truly worth it, and I want to see you benefit from it.

I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $12,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
